name: GauntletCloneAliens
description:
A clone of the classic 1980s arcade fantasy shooter Gauntlet, but with an aesthetic inspired by the 1980s sci-fi horror classic Aliens.

Arrows to move;

Space to fire weapon;

*Pressing Escape will Quit the application at any time; use if frozen*

Features:

-2 player classes

-2 playable leves

Known Bugs:

-Nuke breaks enemy targeting when used
